title: Add document outline to file tree
description: Show heading structure (outline) under each markdown file in the left navigation pane. Headings should be clickable to navigate to that section in the document.

title: Add recent locations memory
description: Save last 5 locations to ~/.inkwell, show in Open Folder dialog, and prompt on startup

title: Add heading, code block, and quote options to text selection toolbar
description: Currently the toolbar only has bold, italic, code, link, strikethrough. Add options for: headings (H1-H3), code blocks, and improve blockquote.
